BaseMods.MiscDesc: This tool is the right tool for the job when making [templateSkill] checks.
Add automatic [SU] to [templateSkill] checks when using this item.
Remove [SE][SE] from all [templateSkill] checks when using this item.
Gain one rank in [templateSkill]

Mod.MiscDesc: Provides concealment equivalent to dense underbrush (Adds [SE][SE][SE] to any Ranged Light, Ranged Heavy, Gunnery, and Perception checks against concealed targets. Adds [BO][BO][BO] to any Stealth checks made by concealed characters).

VehicleProfile.Name: Space Station
VehicleProfile.Crew: 60,000 or more administrators, technicians, and laborers

AvAbility.Name: Droid
AvAbility.Description: Does not need to breathe, eat, or drink, and can survive in vacuum or underwater. Immune to poisons and toxins.

Name: Labor Directives
Description: Labor Directives - Droids with these directives are typically obsessed with their single area of expertise.

Name: Combat Directives
Description: Combat Directives - Droids with these directives are typically used for security purposes.

Name: Translation Directives
Description: Translation Directives - Droids with these directives are typically used for etiquette and protocol.

Name: Repair Directives
Description: Repair Directives - Droids with these directives are typically used to repair machines.

Name: Navigation Directives
Description: Navigation Directives - Droids with these directives are typically used for astronavigation purposes.

Name: Healing Directives
Description: Healing Directives - Droids with these directives are typically used for medical purposes.

Name: Elimination Directives
Description: Elimination Directives - Droids with these directives are typically used for assasination.

BaseMods.MiscDesc: Target must make Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Resilience check. If failed, takes 2 wound at start of turn for 3 rounds, plus 1 round per [TH] rolled.
For the next round (or 30 minutes), user's unarmed attacks gain Burn 4, or add +1 if Burn is already possessed.
When consumed, Brawn is increased by 1 and Willpower is decreased by 1. This effect lasts until the end of the following round.
When consumed, one Critical Injury of severity Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) or less is healed.
Target must immediately make an Average ([DI][DI]) Resilience check. If failed, suffer 5 wounds plus 1 strain per [TH].
Target must make an Average ([DI][DI]) Discipline check. If failed, Willpower is counted as 0 for remainder of encounter or 1 hour, increased once per [TH] rolled.
Cannot be applied to a weapon. Potion must be injested
When consumed, target increases strain threshold by 5 for remainder of encounter (or one hour).
When consumed, target heals all wounds and strain they are currently suffering.
If target died during the current encounter, target makes a Daunting ([DI][DI][DI][DI]) Discipline or Resilience check. If successful, they come back to life and heal one Critical Injury.
If consumed while making a Force power check, suffer 1 Conflict and gain [LI][DA]. If making a Conjure check, add [LI][LI][DA][DA] instead.

Target must immediately make an Average ([DI][DI]) Resilience check. If failed, wound and strain threshold is reduced by half (rounding up) for remainder of encounter (or one hour), increased once per [TH] rolled.
User may employ talisman to roll 1 additional [FO] when making a Force power check or a skill check. The talisman then crumbles to dust.
Target an enemy attempting to move within engaged range to make an Average ([DI][DI]) Fear check as an out-of-turn incidental. If failed, target cannot perform the move maneuver.
When user makes a Knowledge check, may suffer strain up to Intellect to add that many [BO] to check.

User may ignore environmental affects such as fire, acid, and corrosive atmosphere. They act as if in a standard gravitiy field, may breathe underwater and in a vacuum, and may ignore the Burn quality when hit by an attack.
When recovering strain or wounds, may recover that amount plus 1 instead.
When taking damage involving a Force power in some way, may choose to reduce damage taken by half (rounding up).

Mod.MiscDesc: May only be used once per session.

BaseMods.MiscDesc: When the GM flips a Destiny Point to upgrade the ability or difficulty of a skill check involving the user, the user may downgrade the difficulty of the check.

Mod.MiscDesc: Talisman dissolves after a single use.

BaseMods.MiscDesc: When user is targeted by an opposed social skill check where a Force power is involved, the opposing character rolls one fewer [FO].
